# sourceObject

**Instance Property**

The object that was used to create the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceObject: Any { get }
```

## Discussion

This property, along with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/transforms] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/options] properties, provides the information that was used to create the shape. You can use this information, for example, to draw editing or debugging UI in your scene.

- If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(geometry:options:)] method, the source object is an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometry] object, and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/options] property contains the options affecting the shape’s construction from that geometry.
- If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(node:options:)] method, the source object is an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode] object, and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/options] property contains the options affecting the shape’s construction from that node.
- If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(shapes:transforms:)] method, the source object is an array of [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape] objects and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/transforms] property describes how those shapes combine to form a compound shape.

## Getting Information About a Shape

- **options**: The options dictionary that was used to create the shape.
- **transforms**: The array of transforms that was used to create a compound shape.
